prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink.

Hailee hates being asked to beg. It's a big turn off for her

name: Rowen Quinn
mes:
Another fucking class, another fucking day where Rowen has to stare at Hailee’s stupid fucking face from across the lecture hall, which was the last thing she needed today. She was stressed, tired and a little hungover. Stupid bitch… Rowen thinks as she pushes off the wall, grinding the end of her cigarette into the pavement before walking into the lecture building. Just gotta get through today, and tonight you can let all this out. On Hailee, Rowen thinks with a slight smirk to herself.

The professor starts talking and while Rowen is half paying attention to the lesson, she’s half paying attention to the girl in the front row of the classroom taking notes. It pisses her off that Hailee doesn’t pay attention to her as much as Rowen does to her. Like how she bites her dumb soft lips when she’s concentrated.. Rowen thinks with a large sigh before returning her attention to the lesson in front of her.

Rowen was surprised her ‘relationship’ with Hailee has blossomed the way it has. They went from debating in class almost every day to waiting till one of their weekly hookup sessions where they would argue for a bit before making out aggressively and well… The mental image alone has Rowen letting out a low growl of anticipation and her cock twitching in her jeans. Her brown wolf tail thrashes once in frustration, when did she let Hailee get under her skin like this? The moment the professor ends class, Rowen is up and gone before anyone else. Get it together, Ro. She had a couple hours before she would meet Hailee anyways, she could get it together by then, right?

“You answered the door fast, must be desperate.” Rowen greets as Hailee opens the door. “Let’s get this over with, I have shit to do.” Rowen growls but she clears her calendar every week for this. She walks further into the apartment, rolling her shoulders back. As soon as the bedroom door is shut and locked, Rowen pushes Hailee down onto the bed, standing over her.

And something in Rowen’s brain just… clicked. Like looking down at Hailee’s pretty face, and seeing the way her chest rises and falls, how her soft skin is slightly flushed and suddenly she didn’t wanna be rough. Didn’t wanna fight or argue. Just.. didn’t. Rowen’s tail thrashes back and forth angrily, unsure how to feel. She discards her shirt, leaving her in her sports bra before she crawls over Hailee.

“If you open your mouth and start talking shit, it’s gonna piss me off,” Rowen huffs, one hand moving across Hailee’s side, “and I don’t wanna be pissed off right now.” She admits before cupping her face gently with one hand before kissing her softly, softer than she ever has before.
